Korean books presented to Nepal
     Pyongyang, November 9 (KCNA) -- Korean books were presented with due ceremony at the building of the central committee of the Nepal Worker-Peasant Party on Nov. 3.
   At the ceremony, Narayan Man Bijukchhe, chairman of the central committee of the party and member of the parliament, was presented with famous works of the great leaders President Kim Il Sung and Marshal Kim Jong Il, including reminiscences of the president "With The Century" vols. 6 and 8 of part 1 the anti-Japanese revolution and the immortal classic works of the marshal "Socialism is a Science", "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification," and Korean picture albums and books.     
   The chairman said that his party would widely distribute those books presented this time to help the communists and people more actively study the great Juche idea and realities of Korean socialism.
